src: द सिंपसन के पहले साइमन ने कई शोज़ के कई पोज़िशन्स में काम किया था. 1980 के दशक के दौरान उन्होंने टैक्सी, चीयर्स, और द ट्रेसी उल्मैन शो जैसे शो में काम किया था. 1989 में उसने ब्रुक्स और ग्रोएनिंग के साथ द सिम्पसन को रचने में मदद की और वह शो की पहली राइटिंग टीम को नियुक्त करने के लिए उत्तरदायी था. 1993 में शो छोड़ने के बाद भी वे एग्जीक्यूटिव प्रोड्यूसर के पद पर बने रहे और हर सीज़न में लाखों-करोड़ों डॉलर की रॉयल्टी लेते रहे.
mt: 1980s, Simpson worked on several shows in various positions. He worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. After leaving the show in 1993, he remained executive producer and collected millions of dollars in royalties every season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: फ्लूक ने लिखा है कि कुछ लोगों ने महिलाओं द्वारा महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य के बारे में बुलवाने का प्रयास किया जिसमें वे असफल रहे। महिला और पुरुष, दोनों की ओर से बड़ी संख्या में मिले सकारात्मक कमेंट और प्रोत्साहन की वजह से वे इस नतीजे पर पहुँची कि गर्भनिरोधक दवाओं को ज़रूरी दवाओं के तौर पर स्वीकार किया जाना चाहिए.
mt: Fluke wrote that some people tried to bully women about women's health, but failed. A large number of positive comments and encouragement from both men and women led them to conclude that contraceptives should be accepted as essential medicines.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: फ्लूक ने लिखा है कि कुछ लोगों ने महिलाओं द्वारा महिलाओं के स्वास्थ्य के बारे में बुलवाने का प्रयास किया जिसमें वे असफल रहे। महिला और पुरुष, दोनों की ओर से बड़ी संख्या में मिले सकारात्मक कमेंट और प्रोत्साहन की वजह से वे इस नतीजे पर पहुँची कि गर्भनिरोधक दवाओं को ज़रूरी दवाओं के तौर पर स्वीकार किया जाना चाहिए.
mt: Fluke wrote that some people tried to bully women about women's health, but failed. A large number of positive comments and encouragement from both men and women led them to conclude that contraceptives should be accepted as essential medicines.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: “यह पानी की तरह व्यवहार करने जा रहा है. यह बिल्कुल पानी की तरह पारदर्शी है. इसलिए अगर आप किनारे पर खड़े हैं, आप सतह में नीचे मौजूद कंकड़ या कीचड़ देख सकेंगे. स्टोफ़ेन ने कहा, जहाँ तक हम जानते हैं, एक ही ऐसा ग्रह है, जो टाइटन की तुलना में ज़्यादा गतिशीलता दिखाता है और उसका नाम है, धरती.”
mt: “It's going to behave like water. It's going to be completely transparent. So if you're standing on the edge, you'll be able to see through the surface down to the pebbles or mud below. Stoffel said, as far as we know, there's only one other body in the solar system that shows this level of activity and its name is Earth.”
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: यह न केवल इसकी पुष्टि करता है कि कम से कम कुछ डायनासोर के पंख थे, एक सिद्धांत पहले से ही प्रचलित है, लेकिन यह ऐसी जानकारी प्रदान करता जो जीवाश्म आमतौर पर नहीं कर सकते, जैसे रंग और तीन आयामी अरेंजमेंट. वैज्ञानिकों का यह कहना है कि इस जानवर के रोमछिद्र भूरे और कैरोटीनॉयड के नीचे का रंग भूरा-भूरा था। यह खोज पक्षियों में पंखों के विकास की पूरी जानकारी भी प्रदान करती है. हालाँकि, डायनासोर के पंखों के शाफ्ट पूरी तरह से विकसित नहीं होते हैं और उन्हें रैचिस कहा जाता है. लेकिन उनके पंखों में बार्ब्स और बार्बुल्स जैसी अन्य खूबियाँ होती हैं. शोधकर्ताओं ने अनुमान लगाया है कि डायनासोर की अन्य खूबियों की तरह शायद रैचिस भी बाद में विकसित हुए होंगे. पंखों की संरचना से पता चलता है कि उनका उपयोग उड़ान में नहीं, बल्कि तापमान विनियमन या प्रदर्शन के लिए किया जाता था। शोधकर्ताओं ने सुझाव दिया कि, भले ही यह एक युवा डायनासोर की पूँछ हो, लेकिन नमूना वयस्क साहुल दर्शाता है ना कि बच्चे का निचला हिस्सा। शोधकर्ताओं ने सुझाव दिया कि, भले ही यह किसी छोटे डायनासोर की पूंछ है, लेकिन नमूना वयस्क के पंख का लगता है ना कि किसी बच्चे का।
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already in circulation, but provides information that fossils usually cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say the pores of this animal were brown and the color under the carotenoid was brown-brown. This discovery provides the full information of the development of feathers in birds. However, the shafts of the dinosaur's feathers are not fully developed and are called rachises. But they have other features such as barbs and barbules. Researchers have speculated that perhaps the rachises also developed later like other features of the dinosaur. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were used for thermoregulation or display, not flight. Researchers have suggested that, although this may be the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows the adult saurian, not the lower part of a child. Researchers have suggested that, although this may be the tail of a small dinosaur, the specimen looks like the adult's wing, not the child's.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: जबकि एक प्रायोगिक वैक्सीन इबोला से मृत्यु दर में कमी हो सकती है, अब तक, कोई भी ड्रग्स स्पष्ट रूप से संक्रमण का इलाज करने के लिए प्रमाणितनहीं हुआ है. एक एंटीबॉडी कॉकटेल, ZMapp, ने शुरुआत में इस क्षेत्र में विश्वास दिखाया था, लेकिन औपचारिक अध्ययनों ने संकेत दिया कि मौत को रोकने में प्रत्याशित लाभ की तुलना में इसका लाभ कम था। PALM परीक्षण में, ZMapp ने एक नियंत्रण के रूप में कार्य किया, जिसका अर्थ है कि वैज्ञानिकों ने इसे बेसलाइन के रूप में इस्तेमाल किया और इसके साथ तीन अन्य उपचारों की तुलना की.
mt: While a trial vaccine may reduce Ebola mortality, no drugs have yet been proven to clearly treat the infection. An antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in this area, but formal studies indicated that its expected benefit in preventing death was less than that of a control, meaning that scientists used it as a baseline and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: सोमवार को, स्टैनफ़ोर्ड यूनिवर्सिटी स्कूल ऑफ़ मेडिसिन के वैज्ञानिकों ने एक नए डायग्नोस्टिक उपकरण के आविष्कार की घोषणा की जो कोशिकाओं को उनके प्रकार के आधार पर छाँट सकता है: एक छोटी प्रिंट करने योग्य चिप जिसे स्टैण्डर्ड इंकजेट प्रिंटर का उपयोग करके लगभग एक अमेरिकी सेंट के लिए निर्मित किया जा सकता है. शोधकर्ताओं ने कहा है कि यह अल्प आय वाले देशों में कैंसर, टीवी, एचआईवी और मलेरिया के रोगियों की आसानी से पहचान करेगा, जहाँ अमीर देशों की तुलना में स्तन कैंसर जैसी बीमारी में जीवित रहने की दर आधी हो सकती है.
mt: On Monday, scientists at the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic device that can sort cells based on their type: a tiny printable chip that can be made for about a U.S. cent using a standard inkjet printer. Researchers say it will easily identify cancer, TB, HIV and malaria patients in poor countries, where survival rates for diseases like breast cancer could be half that of rich countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: वैज्ञानिकों ने चाँद की सतह पर लोबेट स्कार्प्स नामक ख़राब हुए लैंडफ़ॉर्म की खोज की है जो साफ़ तौर पर चंद्रमा के सिकुड़ने की वजह से हुए हैं. ये प्रपात पूरे चंद्रमा पर पाए गए और न्यूनतम रूप से मौसम के कारण ख़राब हुए दिखाई देते हैं, जो यह दर्शाता है कि किसी भूगर्भीय घटनाओं ने उन्हें हाल ही में बनाया था। यह सिद्धांत इस दावे का खंडन करता है कि चांद पूरी तरह से भूगर्भीय गतिविधि से रहित है.
mt: Scientists have discovered lobate scarp, degraded landforms on the Moon's surface that are clearly the result of lunar contraction. These scarps are found across the entire Moon and are minimally degraded by weathering, indicating that they were recently formed by geological events. This refutes the claim that the Moon is completely devoid of geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: तब से एडेकोया अपने बेटे की हत्या के आरोप में एडिनबर्ग शेरिफ कोर्ट में है। वह अभियोग और मुकदमा लंबित है, लेकिन किसी भी चश्मदीद गवाह को प्रभावित किया जा सकता है, क्योंकि उसकी छवि व्यापक रूप से प्रकाशित हुई है. यह ब्रिटेन में कहीं और आम बात है लेकिन स्कॉटिश न्याय अलग तरीके से काम करता है और अदालतों ने तस्वीरों के प्रकाशन को संभावित नुक़सानदेह के रूप मे देखा हैं | यूनिवर्सिटी ऑफ़ डंडी के प्रोफ़ेसर पामेला फ़र्ग्यूसन लिखते हैं, “अगर संदिग्धों के फ़ोटो आदि प्रकाशित होते हैं तो पत्रकारों को यह ख़तरनाक मार्ग पर चलना लगता है”. क्राउन ऑफिस, जो कि अभियोग पक्ष के लिए ज़िम्मेदार है, ने पत्रकारों को संकेत दिया है कि कम से कम अभियोग लगने तक कोई टिप्पणी नहीं की जाएगी।
mt: Since then, Adedayo has been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court on charges of murdering her son. The case and prosecution are ongoing, but any eyewitnesses could be affected, as her image has been widely published. This is common in Britain, but the Scottish legal system works differently and courts have seen the publication of images as potentially harmful. Pamela Ferguson, a professor at the University of Dundee, writes, "If the photos of suspects are published, it seems to be a dangerous path for journalists to take." The Crown Office, which is responsible for the prosecution, has indicated to journalists that at least no comment will be made until the charges are laid.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: तेज़ बर्फबारी के अलावा, मौसम की ख़राब स्थिति बचाव के प्रयासों में बाधा बन रही है। पिटमैन ने सुझाव दिया कि अगले सप्ताह कुछ समय तक स्थिति में सुधार नहीं होगा. पिटमैन के अनुसार, पैक बर्फ की मात्रा और मोटाई पिछले 15 वर्षों में सीलर्स के लिए सबसे ख़राब है.
mt: In addition to the heavy snowfall, poor weather conditions are hampering rescue efforts. Pitman suggested that the situation would not improve for a few days. Pitman said the amount and thickness of pack snow was the worst in 15 years for the Sled Dogs.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: तेज़ बर्फबारी के अलावा, मौसम की ख़राब स्थिति बचाव के प्रयासों में बाधा बन रही है। पिटमैन ने सुझाव दिया कि अगले सप्ताह कुछ समय तक स्थिति में सुधार नहीं होगा. पिटमैन के अनुसार, पैक बर्फ की मात्रा और मोटाई पिछले 15 वर्षों में सीलर्स के लिए सबसे ख़राब है.
mt: In addition to the heavy snowfall, poor weather conditions are hampering rescue efforts. Pitman suggested that the situation would not improve for a few days. Pitman said the amount and thickness of pack snow was the worst in 15 years for the Sled Dogs.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: गर्भपात की नैतिकता पर विचार करते समय एक महत्वपूर्ण सवाल, जीवन कब शुरू होता है पर संभावित मामलों की बारीकियों पर टिप्पणी करने को अनैतिक बताते हुए रॉबर्ट्स ने इस पर अपने विचार प्रकट करने से साफ़-साफ़ मना कर दिया. हालांकि, उन्होंने अपने पहले के बयान को दोहराया कि रो वर्सस वेड “भूमि का व्यवस्थित कानून” था, जिस में उच्चतम न्यायालय के सुसंगत निर्णयों के महत्व पर जोर दिया गया था। उसने यह पुष्टि भी की है कि उसे गोपनीयता के निहित अधिकारों पर यकीन है, जिस पर कि रो निर्णय आधारित है.
mt: In discussing the ethics of abortion, a key question is when does life begin, and Roberts declined to comment on the nuances of possible cases, saying it would be unethical to comment on the ethics of abortion. However, he reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade was "the settled law of the land," emphasizing the importance of consistent decisions by the Supreme Court. He also confirmed that he believes in the inherent right to privacy on which Roe is based.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: ठीक 8:46 बजे, सुबह पूरे शहर मे चुप्पी फैल गई, ठीक उसी पल पहले जेट ने अपना निशाना बनाया। रातभर आसमान की ओर देखने के लिए प्रकाश की दो किरणों को तैयार किया गया है. साईट पर पांच नई गगनचुम्बी इमारतों पर काम चल रहा है, इन इमारतों के बीच में एक परिवहन केंद्र और स्मारक पार्क होगा।
mt: 8:46 am, the whole city fell silent, just before the jet hit its target. Two beams of light were prepared for the sky all night. Work is underway on five new skyscrapers on the site, a transportation center and memorial park between them.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: सभी गुफाओं, जिनका नाम “सात बहनें” रखा गया, में घुसने की जगह का डायमीटर कम से कम 100 से 250 मीटर (328 से 820 फ़ीट) है. इन्फ़्रारेड चित्र दिखाते हैं कि रात और दिन के बदले तापमान से वे कुछ-कुछ गुफ़ाएँ जैसी हैं. “दिन में ये आस-पास की सतहों से ज़्यादा ठंडी और रात में गर्म होती हैं. उनका ऊष्मीय व्यवहार पृथ्वी की बड़ी गुफाओं जैसा स्थिर नहीं है जो अक्सर काफी स्थिर तापमान बनाए रखती हैं, लेकिन यह जमीन के इन गहरे छेद के अनुरूप है,” यूनाइटेड स्टेट्स जियोलॉजिकल सर्वे (यूएसजीएस) की भूगर्भीय टीम और फ्लैगस्टाफ, एरिजोना में स्थित उत्तरी एरिजोना विश्वविद्यालय के ग्लेन कुशिंग ने कहा।
mt: All of the caves, named “Seven Sisters,” have an entrance diameter of at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet). Infrared images show that they are somewhat like caves in that they are cooler during the day and warmer at night. “During the day, they are cooler than the surrounding surfaces and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as stable as the large Earth caves that often maintain a relatively stable temperature, but it is in line with the ground of these deep holes,” said Glenn Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey and the University of Northern Arizona in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: कथित तौर पर उस शख्स ने भीड़ में विस्फोटकों से हथियारबंद एक तीन पहियों वाले वाहन को निकाल दिया. बम विस्फोट के शक में एक व्यक्ति को गिरफ्तार किया गया है, जिसे धमाके में कुछ चोटें आई हैं. उसका नाम अभी भी अधिकारियों को पता नहीं है, हालाँकि वे जानते हैं कि वह उइघर जातीय समूह का सदस्य है.
mt: A man reportedly pulled out a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives from a crowd. One person was arrested on suspicion of a bomb blast, who received some injuries in the explosion. His name is still unknown to officials, although they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: साउथ अफ्रीका के रस्टेनबर्ग स्थित रॉयल बेफोकेंग स्टेडियम में एक रग्बी यूनियन ट्राई नेशन्स मैच में साउथ अफ्रीका ने ऑल ब्लैक्स (न्यूज़ीलैंड) को हराया है. अंतिम स्कोर एक अंक की जीत थी, 21 और 20, ऑल ब्लैक्स का 15 गेम लगातार जीतने का सिलसिला समाप्त हुआ । स्प्रिंगबोक्स के लिए, इसने पांच-मैचों की हार का सिलसिला समाप्त कर दिया. अभी दो हफ़्ते पहले ही इस ट्रॉफ़ी को अपने नाम कर चुकी 'ऑल ब्लैक्स' टीम का यह फ़ाइनल मैच था. इस सीरीज़ का फ़ाइनल मैच स्प्रिंगबोक्स और ऑस्ट्रेलिया के बीच, अगले हफ़्ते जोहान्सबर्ग के एलिस पार्क में खेला जाएगा.
mt: In a Rugby Union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa, South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) 21-20. The final score was 21-20, ending the All Blacks' streak of 15 consecutive wins. For the Springboks, it ended a streak of five losses. This was the All Blacks' second final match in two weeks. The final match of the series will be between the Springboks and Australia at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: स्पेसवॉक के अंत तक स्पेस स्टेशन मिशन में पहले एक जाइरोस्कोप के नुकसान के बावजूद स्टेशन ने अपना रुख़ बनाए रखा. चियाओ और शारिपोव ने रवैया सुधार थ्रस्टर से एक सुरक्षित दूरी बनाने की घोषणा की है. रूसी ग्राउंड कंट्रोल ने जेट्स को एक्टिवेट किया और स्टेशन का नॉर्मल एटिट्यूड फिर से हासिल हो गया था.
mt: The station maintained its course despite the loss of a gyroscope during the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov announced that they had established a safe distance from the thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and the station regained its normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: स्पेसवॉक के अंत तक स्पेस स्टेशन मिशन में पहले एक जाइरोस्कोप के नुकसान के बावजूद स्टेशन ने अपना रुख़ बनाए रखा. चियाओ और शारिपोव ने रवैया सुधार थ्रस्टर से एक सुरक्षित दूरी बनाने की घोषणा की है. रूसी ग्राउंड कंट्रोल ने जेट्स को एक्टिवेट किया और स्टेशन का नॉर्मल एटिट्यूड फिर से हासिल हो गया था.
mt: The station maintained its course despite the loss of a gyroscope during the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov announced that they had established a safe distance from the thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and the station regained its normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: इस मामले पर वर्जीनिया में मुकदमा चलाया गया क्योंकि यह अग्रणी इंटरनेट सेवा प्रदाता एओएल का घर है, वह कंपनी जिसने आरोपों को उकसाया. यह पहली बार है जब बल्क ई-मेल और स्पैम को, अनचाहे डिस्ट्रिब्यूटर से उपयोगकर्ता के मेलबॉक्स में आने से रोकने के लिए, 2003 में बनाए गए कानून का इस्तेमाल करके विश्वास हासिल किया गया.
mt: The case was brought in Virginia, where AOL is headquartered, the company that was accused of encouraging the practice. It is the first time that bulk e-mail and spam, coming from unwanted distributors to a user's mailbox, has been stopped using the 2003 law that was created to protect users from unwanted e-mail.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: इस मामले पर वर्जीनिया में मुकदमा चलाया गया क्योंकि यह अग्रणी इंटरनेट सेवा प्रदाता एओएल का घर है, वह कंपनी जिसने आरोपों को उकसाया. यह पहली बार है जब बल्क ई-मेल और स्पैम को, अनचाहे डिस्ट्रिब्यूटर से उपयोगकर्ता के मेलबॉक्स में आने से रोकने के लिए, 2003 में बनाए गए कानून का इस्तेमाल करके विश्वास हासिल किया गया.
mt: The case was brought in Virginia, where AOL is headquartered, the company that was accused of encouraging the practice. It is the first time that bulk e-mail and spam, coming from unwanted distributors to a user's mailbox, has been stopped using the 2003 law that was created to protect users from unwanted e-mail.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28 वर्षीय विडाल तीन सीजन पहले सेविला से बारका में शामिल हुए थे। कातलान की राजधानी (बार्सिलोना) में जाने के बाद से, विडाल ने क्लब के लिए 49 गेम खेले थे.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barcelona from Sevilla three seasons ago. In the Catalan capital since, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: जर्क उस दिन पहले इटली के कवरकियानो में प्री-सीज़न ट्रेनिंग के दौरान अभ्यास कर रहे थे. वे रविवार को बोलोनिया के खिलाफ़ योजनाबद्ध मैच से पहले टीम होटल में ठहरे थे. वह रविवार को नियोजित बोलोनिया के खिलाफ होने वाले मैच से पहले टीम के होटल में ठहरा हुआ था।
mt: The team was training in Coverciano, Italy, the day before. They were staying at the team hotel on Sunday before the scheduled match against Bologna.
ref: Jarque was practicing during pre-season training at Coverciano in Italy earlier in the day. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia. He was staying in the team hotel ahead of a match planned for Sunday against Bolonia.

src: कोई सुनामी की चेतावनी जारी नहीं की गई है, और जकार्ता भूभौतिकी एजेंसी के अनुसार, कोई सुनामी की चेतावनी जारी भी नहीं की जाएगी क्योंकि भूकंप 6.5 की आवश्यकता को पूरा नहीं करता था। सुनामी का कोई खतरा नहीं होने के बावजूद भी निवासियों को जान जाने का डर था. इस वजह से उन्होंने अपने कारोबार और घरों को छोड़ना शुरू कर दिया.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued, and the Jakarta Geophysics Agency said no tsunami warning would be issued because the earthquake did not meet the 6.5 requirement. Despite no threat of a tsunami, residents were afraid of being stranded. They started to leave their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: उन्होंने पाया कि सूर्य अन्य सितारों के समान मूल सिद्धांतों पर संचालित होता है: मंडल के सभी सितारों की गतिविधि उनके प्रकाश, उनके परिक्रमण द्वारा संचालित थी, किसी और कारण से नहीं। एक तारे की रॉस्बी संख्या, जो प्लाज़्मा फ़्लो से संबंधित है, का पता लगाने के लिए उसकी चमक और रोटेशन का एक साथ इस्तेमाल किया जाता है, रॉस्बी संख्या जितनी छोटी होगी, चुंबकीय उत्क्रमण के संबंध में तारा उतना ही कम सक्रिय होगा.
mt: They found that the sun operates on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars was driven by their light, their rotation, not by any other cause. A star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow, is determined by using its brightness and rotation together, the smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reconnection.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: उन्होंने पाया कि सूर्य अन्य सितारों के समान मूल सिद्धांतों पर संचालित होता है: मंडल के सभी सितारों की गतिविधि उनके प्रकाश, उनके परिक्रमण द्वारा संचालित थी, किसी और कारण से नहीं। एक तारे की रॉस्बी संख्या, जो प्लाज़्मा फ़्लो से संबंधित है, का पता लगाने के लिए उसकी चमक और रोटेशन का एक साथ इस्तेमाल किया जाता है, रॉस्बी संख्या जितनी छोटी होगी, चुंबकीय उत्क्रमण के संबंध में तारा उतना ही कम सक्रिय होगा.
mt: They found that the sun operates on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all stars was driven by their light, their rotation, not by any other cause. A star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow, is determined by using its brightness and rotation together, the smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reconnection.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 2010 के संघीय चुनाव से पहले 1,400 लोगों ने मतदान किया, 2008 से जो लोग ऑस्ट्रेलिया के गणतंत्र बनने का विरोध करते हैं उनमें 8 प्रतिशत की वृद्धि हुई. कार्यवाहक प्रधानमंत्री जूलिया गिलार्ड ने 2010 के संघीय चुनाव के कैंपेन के दौरान दावा किया कि वह मानती हैं कि रानी एलिजाबेथ द्वितीय के शासनकाल के अंत में ऑस्ट्रेलिया को एक गणतंत्र बनना चाहिए. उनमें से 34 फ़ीसदी लोगों ने मतदान में यह मत साझा करते हुए इच्छा जताई, कि वे क्वीन एलिज़ाबेथ द्वितीय को ऑस्ट्रेलिया की आखिरी रानी बनाना चाहते हैं. सर्वे के नतीजे के मुताबिक, सर्वे में शामिल 29 प्रतिशत लोगों का मानना है कि ऑस्ट्रेलिया को जल्द से जल्द एक गणतंत्र बन जाना चाहिए, जबकि 31 प्रतिशत लोगों का मानना है कि ऑस्ट्रेलिया को कभी भी गणतंत्र नहीं बनना चाहिए.
mt: 1,400 people voted before the 2010 federal election, an increase of 8 percent from those who opposed Australia becoming a republic since the 2008 federal election. Acting Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during her 2010 federal election campaign that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. Of those, 34 percent shared the wish to make Queen Elizabeth II the last queen of Australia. The survey results showed that 29 percent of those surveyed believed Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believed Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: कोमेन संस्था की प्रवक्ता, लेज़ली उन ने बताया कि संस्था के नए नियम के अनुसार ऐसी संस्थाओं को मदद या पैसे नहीं दिए जाएँगे जिन पर कानूनी जाँच चल रही है. कोमेन की नीति ने योजनाबद्ध पितृत्व को एक लंबित जाँच के कारण अयोग्य ठहराया कि कैसे योजनाबद्ध पितृत्व इसके पैसे बताता है और खर्च करता है जो प्रतिनिधि क्लिफ़ स्टर्न्स द्वारा संचालित किए जा रहे हैं. स्टर्न्स इस बात की जाँच कर रहे हैं कि क्या करों का इस्तेमाल ओवरडाइट एंड इन्वेस्टिगेशन्स उपसमिति के अध्यक्ष के रूप में उनकी भूमिका में नियोजित पेरेंटहुड के माध्यम से गर्भपात के लिए किया जाता है, जो कि हाउस एनर्जी एंड कॉमर्स कमेटी के अंतर्गत आता है.
mt: A spokesperson for the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, Leslie Un, said that under the new rules of the committee, no help or money will be given to organizations that are under legal investigation. The committee's policy has deemed planned parenthood ineligible because of a pending investigation into how planned parenthood uses and spends its money, which is being investigated by committee chairman Cliff Sterns. Sterns is investigating whether taxes are used by planned parenthood through its role as chairman of the subcommittee on oversight and investigations, which is under the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: मध्य प्रदेश पुलिस ने चोरी हुए लैपटॉप और मोबाइल फ़ोन हासिल किए. डिप्टी इंस्पेक्टर डी के आर्य ने कहा, “हमने स्विस महिला के साथ बलात्कार करने वाले पाँच लोगों को गिरफ्तार किया है और उनसे उस महिला का मोबाइल और लैपटॉप बरामद किया है”. आरोपियों के नाम बाबा कंजर, भूथा कंजर, रामप्रो कंजर, गाज़ा कंजर और विष्णु कंजर हैं। पुलिस अधीक्षक चंद्र शेखर सोलंकी ने कहा कि आरोपी ढके हुए चेहरे के साथ अदालत में पेश हुए थे.
mt: 5 people have been arrested for raping a Swiss woman and police have recovered her laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector D.K. Arya said, “We have arrested five people who raped a Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop from them.” The names of the accused are Baba Kansar, Bhootha Kansar, Rampro Kansar, Gaja Kansar and Vishnu Kansar. Police Superintendent Chandrashekhar Solanki said that the accused appeared in court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: बचत और सुविधा को ध्यान में रखते हुए, ASUS Eee PC को दुनियाभर में पेश किया गया, यह बात 2007 ताइपे आईटी महीने में चर्चा में रही. लेकिन लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर पर उपभोक्ता बाज़ार मौलिक रूप से विविधतापूर्ण होगा और चीनी गणराज्य के कार्यकारी युआन द्वारा 2007 में ASUS को ताइवान सस्टैनबल अवॉर्ड से सम्मानित किए जाने के बाद बदल जाएगा.
mt: 2007 Taipei IT Month was the talk of the town, but the laptop computer market would be fundamentally diverse and would change after ASUS was awarded the Taiwan Sustainable Award by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China in 2007.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: यह मुद्दा जनवरी की पहली तारीख को शुरू हुआ जब दर्जनों स्थानीय निवासियों ने ओबनाज़वा पोस्ट ऑफ़िस को शिकायत करना शुरू कर दिया कि उन्हें अपने पारंपरिक और नियमित रूप से नए साल के कार्ड नहीं मिले हैं। कल, डाकघर ने नागरिकों और मीडिया को अपनी माफ़ी जारी की, जिसमें पता चला कि लड़के ने नए साल के 429 पोस्टकार्ड सहित 600 से ज़्यादा डाक दस्तावेज़ों को छिपाया था, जो उनके इच्छित प्राप्तकर्ता को नहीं दिए गए थे.
mt: The issue began on January 1st when dozens of local residents began complaining to the Obninsk post office that they had not received their traditional and regular New Year's cards. Today, the post office issued an apology to citizens and the media, revealing that the boy had hidden over 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's postcards, that were not delivered to their intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: सेट में एक-एक सर्विस दोनों पुरुषों के पास रहने के बाद मरे टाई ब्रेकर में पहला सेट हार गया. डेल पोत्रो के पास दूसरे सेट की शुरुआत में एडवांटेज था, लेकिन 6-6 पर पहुँचने के बाद इसमें भी टाई ब्रेक की आवश्यकता थी. पोट्रो ने इस पॉइंट पर अपने कंधे का इलाज करवाया लेकिन खेल में वापसी करने में कामयाब रहे.
mt: 1st set was lost after both men had a service break each. Del Potro had an advantage in the 2nd set, but needed a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro had his shoulder treated at this point, but was able to return to the game.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: उन अधिकारियों के साथ उन्होंने टेक्सास के लोगों को भरोसा दिलाया कि उनकी सुरक्षा के लिए कदम उठाए जा रहे हैं. पेरी ने विशेष रूप से कहा, “इस मामले में सामने आई चुनौती को पूरा करने के लिए दुनिया में कम ही जगह हैं”. गवर्नर ने यह भी कहा, “आज, हमें पता चला है कि कुछ स्कूली उम्र के बच्चों की पहचान हुई है जिनका रोगी से संपर्क था”. वह कहता चला गया, “यह मामला गंभीर है. इस बात की फ़िक्र न करें कि हमारा सिस्टम उम्मीद के मुताबिक काम कर रहा है.”
mt: He assured Texans that steps were being taken to ensure their safety. Perry specifically said, "There are few places in the world that can match the challenge of this case." The governor also said, "Today, we have learned that some school-aged children have been identified who had contact with the patient." He continued, "This is a serious matter. Don't worry that our system is not working as expected."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: द डेली शो और द कोलबर्ट रिपोर्ट से बहुत पहले, जब वे 1988 में UW में छात्र थे, तो हेक और जॉनसन ने एक प्रकाशन की कल्पना की, जो समाचार और समाचार रिपोर्टिंग की पैरोडी करेगा -. अपनी स्थापना के बाद से, द अनियन प्रिंट संस्करण के साथ एक सत्य समाचार पैरोडी साम्राज्य बन गया है, उनका एक वेबसाइट जिससे अक्टूबर के महीने में 5,000,000 अद्वितीय आगंतुक आकर्षित हुए, व्यक्तिगत विज्ञापन हैं, 24 घंटे का समाचार नेटवर्क है, पॉडकास्ट हैं, और हाल ही में हमारी मूर्ख दुनिया नामक विश्व एटलस भी लौंच हुआ है। अल गोर और जनरल टॉमी फ्रैंक्स ने फटाफट बोलकर, अपनी पसंदीदा सुर्खियों को चुरा लिया (गोर ने बताया कि जब 2000 के इलेक्टोरल कॉलेज की हार के बाद, वह टिप्पर के साथ अपनी ज़िंदगी के सबसे अच्छे पल बिता रहे थे, तब द अनियन ने उसकी रिपोर्ट की). उनके कई लेखक जॉन स्टीवर्ट और स्टीफ़न कोलबर्ट के समाचार पैरोडी शो पर बहुत बड़ा प्रभाव डालते हैं.
mt: 1988, when they were students at UW, Heck and Johnson imagined a publication that would parody news and news reporting. Since its inception, The Onion has become a satirical news empire with a print version of its satirical news parody, a website that attracts 5,000,000 unique visitors per month, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and recently launched our moronic world atlas. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have both been quick to steal their favorite headlines (Gore revealed that after the 2000 electoral college loss, his best moments were spent with Tipper, when The Onion reported it). Their many writers have had a huge influence on John Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: व्हाइटहॉल पर लगभग 11:00 बजे स्थानीय समय (यूटीसी + 1) पर विरोध शुरू हुआ, जो प्रधानमंत्री के आधिकारिक आवास डाउनिंग स्ट्रीट के पुलिस-पहरेदार के दरवाजे के सामने था। ठीक 11:00 बजे के बाद, व्हाइटहॉल में उत्तर की ओर जाने वाले ट्रैफ़िक को प्रदर्शनकारियों ने रोक दिया. 11:20 पर, पुलिस ने प्रदर्शनकारियों को यह कहते हुए फ़ुटपाथ पर वापस जाने के लिए कहा कि उन्हें भीड़ इकट्ठा करने के साथ विरोध करने के अधिकार को संतुलित करने की ज़रूरत है. 11:29 बजे के आस-पास, विरोध करने वाले लोग व्हाइटहॉल की ओर बढ़ गए. इसके बाद, वे किनारे-किनारे चलते हुए ट्राफ़ल्गर स्क्वायर, एल्डविच, किंग्सवे से गुजरते हुए होलबर्न की ओर बढ़ गए, जहाँ कंजरवेटिव पार्टी, ग्रैंड कनॉट रूम होटल में अपने स्प्रिंग फ़ोरम का आयोजन कर रही थी.
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC + 1) at the White House, protests began, in front of the Downing Street police guard's gate. Just after 11:00 am, protesters blocked traffic heading north on Whitehall. At 11:20, police told protesters to go back onto the pavement, saying they needed to balance the right to protest with the right to assemble. Around 11:29, protesters began heading towards Whitehall. They then marched along the side of the road, through Trafalgar Square, Aldwych, King's Way, to Holborn, where the Conservative Party, Grand Connaught Rooms hotel was holding its Spring Forum.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: व्हाइटहॉल पर लगभग 11:00 बजे स्थानीय समय (यूटीसी + 1) पर विरोध शुरू हुआ, जो प्रधानमंत्री के आधिकारिक आवास डाउनिंग स्ट्रीट के पुलिस-पहरेदार के दरवाजे के सामने था। ठीक 11:00 बजे के बाद, व्हाइटहॉल में उत्तर की ओर जाने वाले ट्रैफ़िक को प्रदर्शनकारियों ने रोक दिया. 11:20 पर, पुलिस ने प्रदर्शनकारियों को यह कहते हुए फ़ुटपाथ पर वापस जाने के लिए कहा कि उन्हें भीड़ इकट्ठा करने के साथ विरोध करने के अधिकार को संतुलित करने की ज़रूरत है. 11:29 बजे के आस-पास, विरोध करने वाले लोग व्हाइटहॉल की ओर बढ़ गए. इसके बाद, वे किनारे-किनारे चलते हुए ट्राफ़ल्गर स्क्वायर, एल्डविच, किंग्सवे से गुजरते हुए होलबर्न की ओर बढ़ गए, जहाँ कंजरवेटिव पार्टी, ग्रैंड कनॉट रूम होटल में अपने स्प्रिंग फ़ोरम का आयोजन कर रही थी.
mt: 11:00 am local time (UTC + 1) at the White House, protests began, in front of the Downing Street police guard's gate. Just after 11:00 am, protesters blocked traffic heading north on Whitehall. At 11:20, police told protesters to go back onto the pavement, saying they needed to balance the right to protest with the right to assemble. Around 11:29, protesters began heading towards Whitehall. They then marched along the side of the road, through Trafalgar Square, Aldwych, King's Way, to Holborn, where the Conservative Party, Grand Connaught Rooms hotel was holding its Spring Forum.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: उन्होंने कहा “कि अब हमारे पास 4 महीने उम्र वाले चूहे हैं जिन्हें मधुमेह नहीं है जो मधुमेह के रोगी थे। ” डॉ. एहुड उर, नोवा स्कोटिया के हैलिफ़ैक्स में डलहौज़ी विश्वविद्यालय में चिकित्सा के प्रोफ़ेसर और कनाडाई डायबिटीज़ एसोसिएशन के नैदानिक ​​और वैज्ञानिक विभाग के अध्यक्ष ने आगाह किया कि शोध अभी भी अपने शुरुआती दिनों में है. कुछ अन्य विशेषज्ञों की तरह, उन्हें इस बात पर संदेह है कि क्या मधुमेह को ठीक किया जा सकता है, यह देखते हुए कि इन निष्कर्षों की उन लोगों के लिए कोई प्रासंगिकता नहीं है जिन्हें पहले से ही टाइप 1 मधुमेह है.
mt: “We now have mice that are four months old who don’t have diabetes who were diabetic,” said Dr. Udaya S. Kanagalingam, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association. He cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he questions whether diabetes can be cured, given that these findings are not relevant to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: ट्विन ऑटर कल कोकोडा में एयरलाइंस पीएनजी फ्लाइट CG4684 के रूप में उतरने का प्रयास कर रहा था, लेकिन एक बार पहले ही यह विचार रद्द कर चुका था। अपने दूसरे प्रवेश से लैंड होने के तय समय से लगभग दस मिनट पहले यह गायब हो गया. दुर्घटना स्थल का आज पता लगाया गया और वह इतना दुर्गम था कि दो पुलिसवालों को जंगल में उतरा गया ताकि वह स्थल तक पहुंच पाएं और जीवित लोगों की तलाश कर पाएं। खोज में उस ख़राब मौसम के कारण रुकावट पैदा हुई थी जिसकी वजह से लैंडिंग नहीं हो पाई थी.
mt: The Twin Otter was attempting to land at Kokoda as Airlines PNG flight CG4684, but had already cancelled its first approach. It disappeared about ten minutes before its scheduled landing time. The crash site was located today and was so remote that two police officers were dropped into the jungle to reach the site and search for survivors. The search was hampered by bad weather that prevented the landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: “सौभाग्य से मुझे कुछ नहीं हुआ, लेकिन मैंने एक भयावह दृश्य देखा, जब लोग बाहर निकलने के लिए खिड़कियों को तोड़ने का प्रयास कर रह थे। लोग कुर्सियों से शीशे पर मार रहे थे, लेकिन खिड़कियां नहीं टूटी थीं। उन शीशों से एक शीशा आखिरकार टूट गया, और उन्होंने खिड़की से बाहर निकलना शुरू कर दिया, “जीवित बचे फ्रांसिसज़ेक कोवल ने कहा।
mt: “I was lucky, but I saw a terrible sight as people tried to break the windows to get out. People were hitting the glass with chairs, but the windows didn’t break. Finally, one of the windows broke, and they started to get out through the window,” said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: उष्णकटिबंधीय तूफ़ान डेनियल, 2010 अटलांटिक तूफान के मौसम का चौथा नामित तूफ़ान पूर्वी अटलांटिक महासागर में बना है. मियामी, फ्लोरिडा से लगभग 3,000 मील दूर स्थित यह अधिकतम 40 मील प्रति घंटे (64 kph) की तेज़ हवाओं वाला तूफान है. नेशनल हरिकेन सेंटर के वैज्ञानिकों का पूर्वानुमान है कि डेनियल बुधवार तक शक्तिशाली तूफ़ान का रूप ले लेगा. चूँकि तूफ़ान भूस्खलन से बहुत दूर है, इसलिए संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका या कैरिबियन में संभावित प्रभाव का आकलन करना मुश्किल है.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season tropical storm Daniel, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean, about 3,000 miles (4,800 km) east of Miami, Florida. The storm is expected to become a hurricane by Wednesday. The storm is too far from land to make a forecast of potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: डॉ. ली ने रिपोर्टों के बारे में भी अपनी चिंता व्यक्त की है कि अब तुर्की में बच्चे बिना बिमार पड़े ए(एच5एन1) एवियन इन्फ़्लूएंजा वायरस से संक्रमित हो गए हैं. उन्होंने कहा कि कुछ अध्ययनों से पता चलता है कि वैश्विक महामारी का कारण बनने से पहले बीमारी कम घातक हो सकती है. इस बात की चिंता है कि यदि फ़्लू के लक्षण हल्के बने रहे तो अपने रोज़ाना के रूटीन से मरीज़ ज़्यादा से ज़्यादा लोगों को संक्रमित करना जारी रखेंगे.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports that children in Turkey have been infected with the avian influenza virus H5N1 without becoming ill. He said some studies indicate the virus could become less deadly before causing a global pandemic. The concern is that if the flu symptoms remain mild, patients will continue to infect more people in their daily routines.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 9 अगस्त की रात तक, मोराकोट की आँख (केंद्र) चीनी प्रांत फुजियन से लगभग सत्तर किलोमीटर दूर थी। इस तूफान का अनुमान ग्यारह किलोमीटर प्रति घंटे की दर से चीन की ओर बढ़ने का है.
mt: 9 August night, Morakot's eye (center) was about seventy kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian. This storm is expected to move towards China at a rate of eleven kilometers per hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति जॉर्ज डब्ल्यू बुश एशिया के एक हफ़्ते के दौरे की शुरुआत करते हुए 16 नवंबर की सुबह सिंगापुर पहुँचे. उनका सिंगापुर के उप-प्रधान मंत्री वोंग कान सेंग ने स्वागत किया और उन्होंने सिंगापुर के प्रधानमंत्री ली सिएन लूंग के साथ व्यापार और आतंकवाद के मामले पर बातचीत की. मध्यावधि चुनाव में एक हफ्ते तक हारने के बाद, बुश ने लोगों को एशिया में व्यापार के विस्तार के बारे में बताया।
mt: 16 November 2006, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore to begin a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Woon Wan Seng and held talks with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong on trade and terrorism. A week after losing the mid-term elections, Bush told people about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: इसी साल मार्च में, सरकार ने माल ढुलाई करने वाले कुछ और वाहनों को वित्तीय मदद देने का वादा किया था. आज की इस घोषणा के साथ ही, सरकार का वह वादा भी पूरा हुआ. 300 और गाड़ियों से संख्या बनती हैं , 1,300 गाडियाँ जो मंगवाई गई हैं ै ताकिें भीड़भाड़ से निजात मिल सके।
mt: In March this year, the government had promised financial help to some more vehicles for carrying goods. With this announcement, the government has also fulfilled its promise. The number of vehicles now stands at 1,300, which were ordered to avoid congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: इसी साल मार्च में, सरकार ने माल ढुलाई करने वाले कुछ और वाहनों को वित्तीय मदद देने का वादा किया था. आज की इस घोषणा के साथ ही, सरकार का वह वादा भी पूरा हुआ. 300 और गाड़ियों से संख्या बनती हैं , 1,300 गाडियाँ जो मंगवाई गई हैं ै ताकिें भीड़भाड़ से निजात मिल सके।
mt: In March this year, the government had promised financial help to some more vehicles for carrying goods. With this announcement, the government has also fulfilled its promise. The number of vehicles now stands at 1,300, which were ordered to avoid congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: उसने कहा, “इस बात को बताने वाली कोई गुप्त सूचना नहीं है कि निकट भविष्य में किसी हमले की आशंका है. हालांकि, खतरे के गंभीर स्तर को कम करने का मतलब यह नहीं है कि सारा खतरा टल गया है।
mt: “There is no secret information that there is a threat of an attack in the near future. However, reducing the level of threat does not mean that the threat has disappeared completely.”
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: मार्टेली ने कल नौ सदस्यों के एक नए अनंतिम चुनाव परिषद (CEP) में शपथ ली. चार साल में यह मार्टेली का पांचवां सीईपी है। पिछले महीने एक प्रेसिडेंशियल कमीशन ने देश को नए चुनावों की ओर बढ़ने के उपाय के पैकेज के एक हिस्से के रूप में सीईपी के पूर्व त्यागपत्र की अनुशंसा की. अक्टूबर में शुरू हुए व्यापक शासन विरोधी प्रदर्शनों के लिए आयोग का गठन मार्टेली की प्रतिक्रिया स्वरूप हुआ था. 2011 के बाद से, कभी-कभी चुनाव कराने में रहने की वजह से हिंसक विरोध शुरू हो गया था.
mt: Martelly swore in a new nine-member interim electoral council (CEP) yesterday.  The CEP is Martelly's fifth in four years.  Last month, a presidential commission recommended the CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections.  The commission was formed in response to widespread protests against the government that began in October 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: अमेरिकी जिमनास्टिक्स, संयुक्त राज्य ओलंपिक समिति के पत्र का समर्थन करता है. साथ ही, सभी एथलीटों को एक सुरक्षित माहौल देने के लिए, ओलंपिक परिवार के होने की अहमियत स्वीकार करता है. हम USOC के इस कथन से सहमत हैं कि हमारे एथलीटों और क्लबों और उनके खेल, हमारे संगठन के भीतर सार्थक बदलाव के साथ आगे बढ़ कर बेहतर सेवा की जा सकती है ना की विप्रमाणन से | यूएसए जिमनास्टिक्स एक स्वतंत्र जाँच का समर्थन करता है जो इस बात पर प्रकाश डाल सकता है कि लैरी नासर के बचे लोगों द्वारा इतनी हिम्मत से बताए गए प्रपोर्शन का दुरुपयोग इतने लंबे समय तक चल सकता था और किसी भी आवश्यक और उचित परिवर्तन को अपना सकता है. यूएसए जिमनास्टिक्स और यूएसओसी का एक ही लक्ष्य है — एथलीटों को सुरक्षित, सकारात्मक और सशक्त वातावरण में अपने सपनों का अनुसरण करने के लिए जिमनास्टिक्स और अन्य लोगों के खेल को जितना संभव हो सके उतना सुरक्षित बनाना.
mt: The United States Gymnastics, in support of the letter from the United States Olympic Committee, recognizes the importance of the Olympic family in providing a safe environment for all athletes. We agree with USOC that our athletes and clubs, and their sports, can move forward with better service through meaningful change within our organization, not through condemnation. USA Gymnastics supports an independent review that can shed light on how Larry Nassar’s abuse was allowed to continue for so long and what any necessary and appropriate changes can be made. The goal of USA Gymnastics and USOC is to provide a safe, positive and empowering environment for athletes to pursue their dreams in gymnastics and other sports as safely as possible.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: यूएस नेवी ने यह भी कहा था कि वे घटना की जाँच कर रही थी. उन्होंने एक बयान में यह भी कहा, “इस समय क्रू जहाज़ को सुरक्षित निकालने के सबसे बेहतरीन तरीकों का पता लगाने पर काम कर रहा है.” एवेंजर क्लास माइन काउंटरमेज़र शिप, यह जहाज़ पालवन के प्यर्टो प्रिंसेसा के रास्ते में था. इसे यूएस नेवी के सातवें बेडे में तैनात कर दिया है और यह जापान में नागासाकी के सासेबो में स्थित है.
mt: The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, it also said, "The crew is working to determine the best way to safely remove the crew from the ship." The Arleigh Burke-class guided-missile destroyer USS Sampson was on its way to Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It has been assigned to the Seventh Fleet and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

mt: The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, it also said, "The crew is working to determine the best way to safely remove the crew from the ship." The Arleigh Burke-class guided-missile destroyer USS Sampson was on its way to Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It has been assigned to the Seventh Fleet and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: रविवार को देर शाम, यूनाइटेड स्टेट्स के राष्ट्रपति डोनाल्ड ट्रंप ने प्रेस सेक्रेटरी के ज़रिए दिए बयान में बताया कि यूएस सेना सीरिया को छोड़ने वाली है. तुर्की के राष्ट्रपति रजब तैयब इरदुगान के साथ ट्रंप की फ़ोन पर चर्चा होने के बाद घोषणा की गई थी. तुर्की ने आईएसआईएस के लड़ाकों को पकड़ना और निगरानी करना शुरू कर दिया है, बयान में कहा गया है कि यूरोपीय देशों ने प्रत्यावर्तन करने से इन्कार कर दिया है.
mt: On Sunday evening, United States President Donald Trump announced in a statement through his press secretary that the U.S. military will be leaving Syria. The announcement came after a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey has started capturing and monitoring ISIS fighters, the statement said that European countries have refused to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: संयुक्त सेना और अफगान सैनिक समूह साइट को सुरक्षित करने के लिए इलाके में चले गए और दूसरी संयुक्त सेना विमानों को सहायता के लिए भेजा गया. पहाड़ी इलाकों में ज़्यादा दुर्घटना हुई. इसकी वजह आपसी दुश्मनी को माना जाता है. खराब मौसम और कठोर इलाकेे में दुर्घटना स्थल की तलाश के प्रयास किए जा रहे हैं।
mt: A joint force of Afghan and coalition soldiers moved into the area to secure the site and send in other coalition aircraft for assistance. More accidents occurred in mountainous areas, which are believed to be due to friendly fire. Efforts are being made to search for the crash site in the bad weather and harsh terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: 1963 में बाँध बनने के बाद, मौसमी बाढ़ जो पूरे नदी में तलछट फैला देगी वह रुक गई थी. वाइल्डलाइफ़ हैबिटेंट्स के रूप में काम करने वाली रेती और तटों को बनाने के लिए गाद ज़रूरी थी. जिस कारण, दो मछली की प्रजातियाँ विलुप्त हो गई हैं और अन्य दो लुप्तप्राय हो गई हैं, जिसमें हंपबैक चूब भी शामिल है. हालाँकि, बाढ़ के बाद पानी का स्तर सिर्फ़ कुछ ही फ़ीट बढ़ेगा, लेकिन अधिकारी उम्मीद कर रहे हैं कि यह निचले स्तर के सैंडबार्स को फिर से बहाल करने के लिए काफ़ी होगा.
mt: 1963, when the dam was built, seasonal floods that would spread silt across the entire river had been stopped. Sandbars needed to be built for wildlife to live in as habitat. As a result, two fish species have gone extinct and two are endangered, including the humpback chub. However, the flood will only raise the water level by a few feet, but officials hope this will be enough to reestablish lower sandbars.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. src: केन्या के नैरोबी स्थित यूनाइटेड स्टेट्स के दूतावास ने चेतावनी जारी की है कि “सोमालिया के अतिवादी” केन्या और इथियोपिया में आत्मघाती बम हमलों की योजना बना रहे हैं. अमेरिका का कहना है कि उसे एक अज्ञात स्रोत से जानकारी मिली है जो विशेष रूप से कहता है कि आत्मघाती हमलावरों के उपयोग से इथियोपिया और केन्या में “प्रमुख स्थलों” को उड़ा दिया जायेगा।
mt: The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning that “Somali extremists” are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States says it has received information from an unknown source that “major sites” in Ethiopia and Kenya will be bombed using suicide bombers.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: प्रसिद्ध ग्रीक वकील साकिस केचाग्येग्लो और जॉर्ज निकोलाकोपौलोस को कोरीडल्लोस के एथेंस जेल में बंद किया गया है, क्योंकि वे रिश्वत और भ्रष्टाचार के दोषी पाए गए थे. इसके परिणामस्वरूप, ग्रीक कानूनी समुदाय के भीतर एक बड़े घोटाले को अवैध कार्यों के उजागर होने के माध्यम से उठाया गया है जो न्यायाधीशों, वकीलों, सॉलिसिटर और अधिवक्ताओं ने पिछले सालों के दौरान किए हैं. कुछ सप्ताह पहले, पत्रकार माकीस त्रिनताफेलोपोस द्वारा अपने लोकप्रिय टेलीविजन शो ज़ूंगला में अल्फा टीवी में प्रकाशित जानकारी के बाद, संसद के सदस्य और वकील, पेट्रोस मंतौवलोस को पदमुक्त कर दिया गया था क्योंकि उनके कार्यालय के सदस्य अवैध भ्रष्टाचार और भ्रष्टाचार में लिप्त थे। । तबाही के प्रभाव, अवसाद और भय नियमित साप्ताहिक संरचित पीए सत्रों के सशर्त नहीं थे। इतना ही नहीं, टॉप जज एवेंजेलोस कालूसिस को गिरफ़्तार कर लिया गया क्योंकि उन्हें भ्रष्टाचार और दुर्व्यहार के लिए दोषी पाया गया था.
mt: Famous Greek lawyer Saki Kechagias and George Nikolakopoulos were jailed in Corfu's Athens jail, after they were found guilty of bribery and corruption. This resulted in a major scandal being exposed through illegal activities that judges, lawyers, solicitors and barristers had carried out in the past years. A few weeks ago, journalist Makis Trintafyllou was dismissed from his popular TV show Zounghla on Alpha TV after publishing information that MP and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos was dismissed because his office members were involved in illegal corruption and corruption. The effects of the disaster, depression and fear were not conditional on regular weekly structured PIA sessions. Not only that, top judge Evangelos Kalos was arrested after being found guilty of corruption and misconduct.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: रॉबिन उथप्पा ने केवल 41 गेंदों में 11 चौकों और 2 छक्कों की मदद से 70 रन बना कर पारी का सर्वोच्च स्कोर बनाया. मध्य क्रम के बल्लेबाज सचिन तेंदुलकर और राहुल द्रविड़ ने अच्छा प्रदर्शन किया और शतकीय साझेदारी बनाई. लेकिन, कप्तान का विकेट गँवाने के बाद भारत ने पारी समाप्ति तक 7 विकेट खोकर केवल 36 रन ही बनाए।
mt: Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs off 41 balls, including 11 fours and 2 sixes, to top score in the innings. Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put up a good show and put up a century partnership. However, after losing the captain's wicket, India could only score 36 runs off 7 wickets.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: कॉमन्स के प्रशासक एडम क्यूर्डन ने पिछले महीने जब विकिन्यूज़ से बात की थी, तब उन्होंने अपमार्जन पर अपनी निराशा व्यक्त की थी. “वह [वेल्स] शुरू से ही हमसे झूठ बोलता रहा है। सबसे पहले, ढोंग करते हुए कि यह कानूनी कारणों के लिए था। दूसरा, अपनी कला को हटाने के समय तक यह जताते हुए कि वह हमारी बात सुन रहा था।” सामुदायिक गुस्से के कारण उस साइट के लिए यौन विषय के बारे में एक नीति का मसौदा तैयार करने के लिए मौजूदा प्रयासों का नेतृत्व किया गया, जो लाखों खुले तौर पर लाइसेंस प्राप्त मीडिया को होस्ट करता है.
mt: In a previous interview with Wikinews in July, Currin expressed his disappointment with Wales. "He [Wales] has been lying to us from the start. First, pretending it was for legal reasons. Second, until the time he removed our policy, pretending he was listening to us."  The current efforts to lead the drafting of a policy for the site regarding sexually explicit content, which hosts millions of openly licensed media, was in response to community outrage.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: महिला रैंकों को शामिल करने का समर्थन सभी नहीं कर रहे थे। 2004 के ओलंपिक रजत पदक विजेता आमिर खान ने कहा, “मुझे दिल से लगता है कि महिलाओं को लड़ाई नहीं करनी चाहिए. ऐसी मेरी राय है”. अपनी टिप्पणियों के बावजूद उसने कहा कि वह लंदन में आयोजित 2012 ओलिम्पिक्स में ब्रिटिश प्रतिस्पर्धियों का समर्थन करेगा.
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan said, “I feel in my heart that women should not fight. That is my opinion.” Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amir Khan said, “I feel in my heart that women should not fight. That is my opinion.” Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London.

src: इंडियानापोलिस मोटर स्पीडवे पर एक दुर्घटना में 13 वर्षीय मोटरसाइकिल रेसर पीटर लेंज़ की मृत्यु हो गई है। जब वह तेज़ दौड़ेने जा रहा था, तब लेन्ज़ अपनी बाइक से गिर गया था और उसके बाद साथी रेसर ज़ेवियर ज़्याट द्वारा मारा गया था. ऑन-ट्रैक मेडिकल स्टाफ़ द्वारा तुरंत शुरुआती उपचार देने के बाद एक स्थानीय अस्पताल में ले जाया गया जहाँ बाद में उसकी मृत्यु हो गई थी. ज़यात को दुर्घटना में चोट नहीं लगी थी।
mt: 13-year-old motorcycle racer Peter Lenz died in an accident at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While he was racing, Lenz fell off his bike and was then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately given initial treatment by on-track medical staff and taken to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: सभी उम्र और पृष्ठभूमि वाले लोगों के लिए विमान में यात्रा करना एक डरावना अनुभव हो सकता है. खास कर, अगर उन्होंने पहले कभी हवाई यात्रा न की हो या फिर हवाई यात्रा के दौरान किसी दर्दनाक घटना का सामना करना पड़ा हो. इसके लेकर शर्माने की कोई बात नहीं है: यह निजी डर या दूसरी चीज़ें नापसंद होने से अलग नहीं है जो हर किसी में हो सकता है. कुछ के लिए, विमान के काम करने के तरीके और उड़ान के दौरान क्या होता है, इस बारे में समझना एक ऐसे डर को दूर करने में मदद कर सकता है जो अज्ञात या नियंत्रण में न होने पर आधारित है.
mt: For many people, flying in an airplane can be a scary experience. Especially if they have never flown before or have had a traumatic experience while flying. There is no shame in being afraid: it is no different than disliking other things that everyone can have. For some, understanding how airplanes work and what happens during a flight can help alleviate a fear based on the unknown or being out of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: आजकल हवाई यात्रा शायद ही कभी एयरलाइन के माध्यम से सीधे बुक की जाती हैं , पहले बिना खोज और कीमतों की तुलना के बिना | कभी-कभी विभिन्न एग्रीगेटर्स पर एक ही फ्लाइट के अलग-अलग मूल्य हो सकते हैं और खोज परिणामों की तुलना करना और बुकिंग से पहले एयरलाइन की स्वयं की वेबसाइट भी देखना लाभदायक होता है।
mt: Nowadays, air travel is rarely booked directly with an airline, first without searching and comparing prices | Sometimes different aggregators can have different prices for the same flight and it is beneficial to compare search results and look at the airline's own website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: आजकल हवाई यात्रा शायद ही कभी एयरलाइन के माध्यम से सीधे बुक की जाती हैं , पहले बिना खोज और कीमतों की तुलना के बिना | कभी-कभी विभिन्न एग्रीगेटर्स पर एक ही फ्लाइट के अलग-अलग मूल्य हो सकते हैं और खोज परिणामों की तुलना करना और बुकिंग से पहले एयरलाइन की स्वयं की वेबसाइट भी देखना लाभदायक होता है।
mt: Nowadays, air travel is rarely booked directly with an airline, first without searching and comparing prices | Sometimes different aggregators can have different prices for the same flight and it is beneficial to compare search results and look at the airline's own website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: कूरियर कंपनियों को सामान को जल्दी से और अच्छे तरीके से पहुंचाने के लिए भुगतान किया जाता है। अक्सर, व्यापारिक दस्तावेजों, व्यापारिक वस्तुओं या मरम्त के लिए प्रयोग किये जाने वाले स्पेयर पार्ट्स को समय से पहुँचाने में बहुत महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका होती है। चुनिंदा रूट पर, बड़ी कंपनियों के खुद के विमान हैं, लेकिन अन्य रूट पर और छोटी फ़र्म के लिए यह एक समस्या है. यदि वे एयर फ़्रेट के ज़रिए चीज़ों को भेजते हैं, तो कुछ रूट्स पर अनलोडिंग करने और कस्टम के लिए कुछ दिन लग सकते हैं. इसे तेज़ी से प्राप्त करने का एकमात्र तरीका इसे चेक किए गए सामान के रूप में भेजना था। एयरलाइन के नियम उन्हें बिना यात्री के सामान भेजने की अनुमति नहीं देंगे, और यहीं पर आप काम आएँगे।
mt: Courier companies are paid to deliver goods quickly and efficiently. Often, business documents, business goods or parts for repair are very important to be delivered on time. On selected routes, large companies have their own planes, but on other routes and small firms, this is a problem. If they send things by air freight, it can take a few days to unload and go through customs on some routes. The only way to get it quickly was to send it as checked baggage. Airlines' rules will not allow them to send goods without passengers, and this is where you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: आपको अपनी बार-बार उड़ने वाली एयरलाइन को संधि में ध्यान से चुनना चाहिए। हालाँकि, आप यह सोचते होंगे कि आप जिस एयरलाइन से अक्सर यात्रा करते हैं उसी से यात्रा करना ज़्यादा सही है. आपको इस बात की जानकारी होनी चाहिए कि एयरलाइन में दी जाने वाली खास सुविधाएँ अक्सर अलग-अलग होती हैं. इसलिए, अक्सर यात्रा करने वाले यात्रियों की राय ज़्यादा सही होगी जो एक ही क्षेत्र में काम करने वाली अलग-अलग एयरलाइन से यात्रा करते हैं.
mt: You should carefully choose your frequent flyer airline. Although you may think that it is better to fly with the airline you fly with most often. You should be aware that the special services offered by the airline are often different. Therefore, the opinion of frequent travelers who work in the same area with different airlines is more correct.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: आपको अपनी बार-बार उड़ने वाली एयरलाइन को संधि में ध्यान से चुनना चाहिए। हालाँकि, आप यह सोचते होंगे कि आप जिस एयरलाइन से अक्सर यात्रा करते हैं उसी से यात्रा करना ज़्यादा सही है. आपको इस बात की जानकारी होनी चाहिए कि एयरलाइन में दी जाने वाली खास सुविधाएँ अक्सर अलग-अलग होती हैं. इसलिए, अक्सर यात्रा करने वाले यात्रियों की राय ज़्यादा सही होगी जो एक ही क्षेत्र में काम करने वाली अलग-अलग एयरलाइन से यात्रा करते हैं.

You should be aware that the special services offered by the airline are often different.
